_header: And so betide a time that he
Subjects: Katherine of Alexandria, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: The Life of St Katherine in the Scottish Legendary — in couplets

CULGg26.First Lines:
…& sa betyd a tyme þat heof Alexandir to þe
                    cite…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…Requeris hire þat I ma twyneowt of þis lyf but
                    dedly syneameN ameN ameN
CULGg26.Attributed Title:
katrina (RT, 380-395); Explicit vita beate KatRine Virginis &
                        cetera (f. 395)
